alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Northern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 3:07AM MDT until March 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 9 inches, greatest south of Harlowton and Billings. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, and southeast Montana. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. The cold and wet conditions could be hazardous for young livestock. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect higher-end accumulations mainly on grassy surfaces and locations above 4000 ft. Snow is expected to lighten up this evening, then pick back up on Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Northern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone
